item.title: Single Point Sensor Systems Main Tanks 2 and 3 Sensors (Reserve Transfer) – Reserve Tanks Empty

remarks.para: May be inoperative with reserve tanks 2 and 3 empty provided maximum takeoff weight is limited to 785,000 lbs (356,000 kgs).

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
CWT fuel included as part of ZFW may be used en route.

numlitem.para: Actual takeoff weight cannot exceed 785,000 lbs.
Center Wing Tank fuel must be included as part of the ZFW but is considered usable en route.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "#2 OR #3 MAIN TANK SINGLE PT SENSORS SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
